attributes.action: Stop a second Scottish Referendum on Independence
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned call upon the UK and Scottish parliaments to fight to prevent boundaries between the North and South of Ireland and between Scotland and England/Wales.

A second Scottish Referendum is not going to aid stabalisation and the Scottish government should respect the decision made in 2014.
attributes.background: Calling on the UK Parliament to urge the Scottish Government to work with Westminster in order to build a stronger Independent United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland and not call another Scottish Indy Referendum.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134361
